get.description: Return all the nodes currently available on the Panel.

post.description:
Create a new node on the Panel. Returns the created node and an HTTP/201
status response on success.

get.description: Return data for a single instance of a node.

patch.description: Update an existing node on the Panel.

delete.description:
Deletes a given node from the Panel as long as there are no servers
currently attached to it.

get.description: Return all the servers that currently exist on the Panel.

post.description: Create a new server on the system.

get.description: Show a single server transformed for the application API.

Handle request to list all users on the panel. Returns a JSON-API representation
of a collection of users including any defined relations passed in
the request.

post.description:
Store a new user on the system. Returns the created user and an HTTP/201
header on successful creation.

get.description:
Handle a request to view a single user. Includes any relations that
were defined in the request.

patch.description:
Update an existing user on the system and return the response. Returns the
updated user model response on success. Supports handling of token revocation
errors when switching a user from an admin to a normal user.

Revocation errors are returned under the 'revocation_errors' key in the response
meta. If there are no errors this is an empty array.

delete.description: Handle a request to delete a user from the Panel. Returns a HTTP/204 response on successful deletion.

get.description:
Returns the configuration information for a node. This allows for automated deployments
to remote machines so long as an API key is provided to the machine to make the request
with, and the node is known.
Retrieve a specific server from the database using its external ID.
Retrieve a specific user from the database using their external ID.

Finds any nodes that are available using the given deployment criteria. This works
similarly to the server creation process, but allows you to pass the deployment object
to this endpoint and get back a list of all Nodes satisfying the requirements.

patch.description: Update the details for a specific server.
Update the build details for a specific server.
Update the startup and environment settings for a specific server.

post.description: Suspend a server on the Panel.
Unsuspend a server on the Panel.
Mark a server as needing to be reinstalled.
Starts a transfer of a server to a new node.
Cancels a transfer of a server to a new node.

get.description: Return all the allocations that exist for a given node.

post.description: Store new allocations for a given node.

delete.description: Delete a specific allocation from the Panel.

get.description: Return a listing of all databases currently available to a single server.

post.description: Create a new database on the Panel for a given server.

get.description: Return a single server database.

delete.description: Handle a request to delete a specific server database from the Panel.

post.description: Reset the password for a specific server database.

get.description: Return all the database hosts currently registered on the Panel.

post.description:
Store a new database host on the Panel and return an HTTP/201 response code with the
new database host attached.

get.description: Return a single database host.

patch.description: Update a database host on the Panel and return the updated record to the user.

delete.description: Delete a database host from the Panel.

get.description: Return all eggs
Return a single egg that exists

delete.description: Delete an egg from the Panel.

get.description: Return a single egg as yaml or json file (defaults to YAML)

post.description:
Create a new egg on the Panel. Returns the created egg and an HTTP/201 status response on success
If no uuid is supplied a new one will be generated
If an uuid is supplied, and it already exists the old configuration get overwritten

delete.description: Delete an egg from the Panel.

get.description: Return all the mounts currently available on the Panel.

post.description:
Create a new mount on the Panel. Returns the created mount and an HTTP/201
status response on success.

get.description: Return data for a single instance of a mount.

patch.description: Update an existing mount on the Panel.

delete.description:
Deletes a given mount from the Panel as long as there are no servers
currently attached to it.

post.description: Adds eggs to the mount's many-to-many relation.
Adds nodes to the mount's many-to-many relation.
Adds servers to the mount's many-to-many relation.

delete.description: Deletes an egg from the mount's many-to-many relation.
Deletes a node from the mount's many-to-many relation.
Deletes a server from the mount's many-to-many relation.

get.description: Return all the roles currently registered on the Panel.

post.description:
Store a new role on the Panel and return an HTTP/201 response code with the
new role attached.

get.description: Return a single role.

patch.description: Update a role on the Panel and return the updated record to the user.

delete.description: Delete a role from the Panel.

default.description: Placeholders for rules added in withValidator() function.

errors.description: A detailed description of each field that failed validation.
